contents:
目前@NewsX已经在主页更新了#真实中国地图2.0版

Thousands wrote in. Thanks. Here's #RealMapOfChina 2.0. Improved depiction of McMahon line, Taiwan & South China sea islands indicator added. Serious cartographers please take this up. 

谷歌渣翻：成千上万的留言。谢谢。这是#真实中国地图 2.0。改进了对麦克马洪线的描述，增加了台湾和中国南海诸岛指标。认真的制图师请收下这个。

https://t.co/LcFwQZp8tr
